title: River North 1 Bedroom. W/D, Hwd Flr, Balcony, Great Amenities Gym/Pool
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 70482230', 'Rent: $2,458 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Parking:: attached garage', 'A great unit in Central River North!', 'Call, or just showing?', 'Easy access to 90/94 and a 5 minute walk to the CTA Purple, Brown and Red Lines.', 'Central to shops and restaurants.', 'Whole Foods 3 blocks away.', 'Each apartment home features driftwood plank floors, stainless steel energy saving appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, quartz countertops and garbage disposal.', 'Most units also have a balcony.', 'Even the security is state of the art, with keyless entry and smartphone integration.', 'Your pets are welcome here, with a doggie spa, lounge and gated outdoor dog park.', 'Weight and breed restrictions do apply.', 'Covered parking is available on site for an additional charge.', 'FEATURES', 'Balcony-All Units', 'Central Air-Yes', 'Dishwasher-All', 'Dogs-No Weight Limit', 'Flooring-Hardwood Only', 'Laundry- W/D In Unit', 'Luxury
